title: Jumbo family to take full ownership of high street staple Hema - DutchNews.nl
snippet: Newsletter Donate Advertise · December 2, 2025 · A Hema Store in France. Photo: Dutch News · Household goods and clothes retail group Hema is set to come entirely under the control of the Van Eerd family’s investment vehicle, which also owns supermarket chain Jumbo.

title: Hem - 2025 Company Profile, Team, Funding & Competitors - Tracxn
snippet: Hem - Internet-first brand of multi-category home improvement products. Acquired by Vitra. Raised a total funding of $5M over 1 round from 12 investors.

title: BC Partners to acquire Com Hem | Carlyle
snippet: London – BC Partners, a leading international private equity firm, today announces that it has signed an agreement to acquire Com Hem, Sweden’s leading TV, broadband and telephony company, from The Carlyle Group (“Carlyle”) and Providence Equity Partners (“Providence”). Financial ...

title: Com Hem
snippet: News · Q3 Announcement 2025 · Presentation · Webcast · Transcript · Divestment · EQT III acquired Com Hem AB, a Swedish cable TV operator, in 2003. Com Hem was one of the largest operators in Sweden, offering pay-TV and broadband internet access as the leading player in an attractive market.
